law.catch_line: Conditions necessary for adoption without consent of child's biological living parents.

text.section:
Upon the conclusion of proof and argument of counsel, the Circuit Court shall enter findings of fact, conclusions of law, and a decision either:
Granting the adoption without the biological parent's consent; or
Dismissing the adoption petition, and stating whether the child shall be returned to the biological parent or the child's custody granted to the state, another agency, or the petitioner.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 18, effective March 17, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994.
